questions.question: What is the principle behind UV spectrophotometry for DNA quantification?

answers.a: Measurement of light scattering by DNA molecules
answers.b: Measurement of absorbance of UV light by nucleic acids at 260 nm
answers.c: Measurement of fluorescence of ethidium bromide-bound DNA
answers.d: Measurement of color change due to DNA–protein interaction
